title: Remove negative numbers from ArrayList - condition

content.question: The code segment is intended to remove all negative values from  numbers.  Which of the following best describes the conditions in which the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: The code segment works as intended for all possible contents of  numbers.
The code segment works as intended only when negative numbers are not in adjacent positions in  numbers.
The code segment works as intended only when  numbers is sorted.
The code segment works as intended only when there are no duplicate values in  numbers.

content.answer: The code segment works as intended only when negative numbers are not in adjacent positions in  numbers.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
